snippet.title: Livelock - Official Vanguard Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Vanguard joins The Few in the newest gameplay trailer for Livelock. Armed with a massive hammer, Vanguard serves as a thoughtful guardian as he stands strong on the front lines of battle.  Although he has a strong, imposing stature, Vanguard is the most intelligent of The Few allowing him to tackle some of the most powerful Cluster enemies. 

Livelock is a fast-paced cooperative top-down shooter based in a post-human world where machines are waging an infinite war against each other. Livelock will launch in 2016 on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC.

Nearly a century after a cataclysmic gamma ray burst, humanity is on the brink of survival. Clusters - groups of corrupted machines control what remains of the earth, fighting each other over resources that now threatens the very planet itself. 

For more information about Livelock, visit http://www.playlivelock.com
